column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Let me tell you: it's beautiful. Lots of glass letting in natural daylight
column3: natural colors and a large display of charming butter dishes and platters. Their simple display of baked goods and desserts can make even the dessert-hater's mouth water. We couldn't decide what to get
column4: so we decided to go splitsies on a chocolate croissant and some breakfast roll (I forgot). And
column6: there was a wide variety of macaroons
column7: with every color of the rainbow.
